thread.title: Here's What to Do at the Delaware Beaches This Weekend
thread.title_full: Here's What to Do at the Delaware Beaches This Weekend

author: admin
title: Here's What to Do at the Delaware Beaches This Weekend
text:
The Delaware beaches are a popular destination throughout the spring and summer, but the fun doesn’t end during the off-season! From annual festivals to specials and events at local eateries, there’s plenty to do at the Delaware beaches in the slow season. With our weekly events roundup, it’s easier than ever to find new ways to have fun.
Bookmark this page and check back each week for fun things to do at the Delaware beaches during the fall and winter weekends.
Friday, December 27 Schellville’s Winter Celebration If you missed Schellville in the days leading up to Christmas, don’t worry! There are still two weeks for you to check out this enchanted winter celebration. This year, enjoy the festivities with no tickets or reservations needed. Expect winter fun for the whole family in the form of train rides, a sledding hill, a tree maze and beer garden, the “Merry Christmas Lane” filled with child-sized houses and businesses, live entertainment, plenty of food and drinks, and much more. Want to elevate the occasion? Rent out a private dining area for the ultimate holiday dining experience. Schellville is the place to be every weekend throughout December. Check online for hours and more information.
Behind Tanger Outlets Seaside, 36470 Seaside Outlet Drive, Rehoboth Beach
Naughty or Nice: Holiday Drag Show Enjoy a holiday-themed drag show at the Milton Theatre. Hosted by Magnolia Applebottom, who’s joined by Alondra Sanchez and BEV, the evening is sure to be a blast filled with unforgettable performances, hilarious parodies, jaw-dropping costumes, and festive cheer.
110 Union Street, Milton
Saturday, December 28 Resin Wave End Table Workshop With Artist George Todd Create your own beachy end table with a professional artist to walk you through the process. The DIY workshop costs $125 per person and includes all the materials you need to create a stunning end table for your home. Register online and head to Shore Marketplace in Lewes at noon for the workshop.
17689 Coastal Highway, Lewes
Deadlifts and Doughnuts Get a jumpstart on your 2025 fitness goals with Rehoboth Beach Barbell Club. Whether you’re an experienced lifter or a first-timer, all experience levels are welcome at this social lifting event. Just grab a friend, pack your gym bags, and head to Rehoboth for a morning workout.
20819 Coastal Highway, Rehoboth Beach
Sunday, December 29 Sunday Game Day at Lefty’s Lefty’s is the go-to spot for football fans in Lewes. With NFL Sunday Ticket, Lefty’s shows every game on 36-plus TVs, so you don’t have to miss a single play. It’s the perfect family-friendly location to enjoy happy hour drink specials, Sunday football, food, and fun.
36450 Plaza Boulevard, Lewes
$19 Dim Sum Night at Bodhi Kitchen Bodhi Modern Asian Kitchen is a hotspot for Asian-inspired fare in downtown Rehoboth. On Sundays, swing by for a $19 dim sum night along with a menu full of Asian favorites. Pair your meal with a specialty cocktail or cold beer from the bar.
243 Rehoboth Avenue, Rehoboth Beach
Want to see your off-season coastal Delaware event on our weekend roundup? Let us know about it and add it to our calendar for even more visibility!
